articles.title: Sourcery 2.0 Expands Language Support
articles.content: Sourcery releases version 2.0, expanding beyond Python to support multiple programming languages with enhanced AI-powered refactoring capabilities.
articles.summary: Sourcery releases version 2.0, expanding beyond Python to support multiple programming languages with enhanced AI-powered refactoring capabilities....
